name: expedition_014
description:
expedition P_014 is an Open World/Platformer student game project.

A small robot, P_014, lands on an unknown planet. Its objective? It doesn't know it!
Learn alone to use its abilities in order to explore this universe.

Meet robots from previous expeditions left there and repair them to communicate with. 

Discover this planet, the history of mankind and about himself. 
With all of its adventures, P_014 will learn about himself and develop a consciousness.

Featuring an hour of gameplay with several quests given by multiple characters.
This project was done with Unreal Engine 4 in a month and a half, achieved by 9 Game Designers.

The Team:

  • Hugues Antiphon
  • Leo Brover
  • Leo Compe
  • Marine Nicault
  • Quentin Croizit
  • Quentin Gauthier
  • Romain Sautron
  • Thomas Rogulski
  • William Rey-Pommier
